amendment.description: To provide for the identification of certain high priority corridors on the National Highway System and to include and designate certain route segments on the Interstate System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3967 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3967 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR2964-2966; text: CR S2964-2965) To provide for the identification of certain high priority corridors on the National Highway System and to include and designate certain route segments on the Interstate System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3967 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3967 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3896.
